BBEX3.A.HRK.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates rates for the euro in Croatia / EUR 1 = HRK ... (middle)
Source: Calculated on the basis of the buying and selling rates of the following banks: Since October 2010: Croatian National Bank, Zagreb. 1999 - September 2010: Zagrebacka Banka, Zagreb.
Methodology: 1999, 2000 and 2006 to 2011 calculated on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates, 2001 to 2005 on the basis of daily rates and from 2012 on the basis of month-end rates.
